title: Radio messages reveal how Hülkenberg overruled team on way to sensational British GP podium
summary: Nico Hülkenberg's first F1 podium followed a faultless British GP drive where he went against his team with strategy calls that proved crucial in wet weather at Silverstone. Here are the radio messages that show how he pulled it off

qa_pairs.question: Which driver achieved their first Formula 1 podium at the British Grand Prix?
What type of weather conditions did Hülkenberg navigate during the British GP to secure his podium?
Which team did Nico Hülkenberg go against regarding strategy calls during the British GP?
